EmailTemplate.subject: The JetWave Upgrade for GIV Has Finally Arrived
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://standardaero.com/]]>
THE JETWAVE IN-FLIGHT CONNECTIVITY UPGRADE FOR GIV
Take to the skies without fear of falling behind on business with Honeywell’s fast and reliable inflight-connectivity solution, JetWave™. Thanks to StandardAero, Gulfstream GIV customers can travel the globe and get world-wide coverage with speeds up to 15 Mbps.
Plus, thanks to Inmarsat’s Jet ConneX Ka-band satellite network, which exclusively powers JetWave, your aircraft will serve as a work hub or entertainment zone with reliable and unparalleled connection speeds. Host a videoconference, browse the web and stream content without delays – it’s all possible with JetWave.
Get connected today and experience truly seamless connectivity when you travel around the world.
START STREAMING <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/StandardAero_JetWave_2017.html]]>
